headline: Empower entrepreneurs seeking to advance humanity.
contents: Axiom Associates is a Korea-based early stage venture fund. Our mission is to empower exceptional and daring entrepreneurs seeking to advance humanity. We believe these extraordinary companies and breakthrough technologies can greatly harness the human potential to make the world a better place.

With this long-term vision, we work to foster our companies by supporting them with the best investors, advisors and global network throughout all stages of their growth. We help our portfolio companies with financing, business development, strategic and operational support, and providing them with global network.

Philanthropy, honesty and integrity are our core values at Axiom. We seek founders who will collaborate with us towards these common goals of making our communities better. Some of the areas that interest us the most are healthcare, biotechnology, clean technology and education.

address.name: Axiom Associates Korea, Inc.
address.detail: #1013, 311 Gangnam-daero, Seocho-dong, Seocho-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea, 06628
